SELECT productid, productname, productdetail, productprice FROM subproduct WHERE productid = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYCALL (callNum, userId, couponCode, productId, callAmount, callPrice, callDate) VALUES (callnum_seq.nextval, #{userId}, 0, #{productId}, 1, #{callPrice}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT callnum FROM( select callnum from paycall WHERE userid = #{userId} ORDER BY callDate DESC ) where rownum = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (payednum, payedmethod, ordernum, payeddate, payedprice, payeduser, payerbank, payedokdate, payedstatus, payedcode, payedvat) VALUES (paynum_seq.nextval, #{payedMethod}, #{orderNum}, #{payedDate}, #{payedPrice}, #{userId}, 'N', #{payedOkDate}, 'Y', #{payedCode}, #{payedVat})
mapper.select: SELECT payednum, payedokdate, userid, PRODUCTTERM FROM (SELECT py.payednum, py.payedokdate, pc.userid, sp.PRODUCTTERM, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY py.payednum DESC) AS rnum FROM payment py JOIN paycall pc ON py.ordernum = pc.callnum JOIN subproduct sp ON pc.productid = sp.productid JOIN itda_user iu ON pc.userid = iu.userid WHERE iu.userid = #{userId}) WHERE rnum = 1
